page.title: 07SCHOOL DAY IN HIGHAM FERRERS
page.content: 7:05 I get up, whip off my pyjamas and have a strip wash. 7:15 I have my breakfast, cornflakes and a nice cup of tea. 7:25 I put on my uniform and brush my hair. I get all my sports gear and my books together. 8:10 I start walking to school. 8:25 I arrive at school and chat to friends as I wait for the first lesson to begin. 8:55 Lessons start with Maths and E.S. 10:35 Playtime. 10:55 More lessons, Games and Drama. 12:30 Lunchtime. 13:30 German and English lessons. 15:30 School ends. I go home and do all my Homework before watching T.V. 19:30 Dad gets in from work and we all have bacon and eggs for tea. 21:30 Bedtime. I read for a while before going to sleep.
